sentences.en: ...the cool underbrush of the rain forest.
sentences.cn: …雨林中使人感觉凉爽的下层灌丛。

sentences.en: A flashlight beam probed the underbrush only yards away from their hiding place.
sentences.cn: 一束手电筒的光束在离他们的藏身之地只有几码远的灌木丛里搜寻着。

sentences.en: Inconspicuously, I edged along the baseball field, then slipped into underbrush.
sentences.cn: 我躲躲闪闪地沿着棒球场的边缘向前走, 随后又消消地溜进了灌木丛.

sentences.en: Only someone knowing the terrain intimately could have picked his way through all that underbrush.
sentences.cn: 只有熟知这一带地势的人才能择路穿行那片矮树林.

sentences.en: Shrubs and small trees growing beneath taller trees; underbrush .
sentences.cn: 被矮小的树、植被或丛林 稀疏 得覆盖.

sentences.en: Speckled quails rustled in the underbrush.
sentences.cn: 鹌鹑在矮树丛里沙沙作响.

sentences.en: The shot of Aayla Secura marching through the underbrush was actually a few seconds longer.
sentences.cn: 艾娜·塞库拉在矮树丛中穿行的镜头实际上也有几秒钟删节.

sentences.en: The trail was steep and thick with underbrush.
sentences.cn: 那条小路非常陡峭，而且长满了灌木丛。

sentences.en: The wild boar crept into the underbrush the wolf jumped up a tree.
sentences.cn: 说完,野猪急急忙忙地藏进了灌木丛里,狼跳到一棵大树上.

sentences.en: They crossed the stream and waded into the underbrush.
sentences.cn: 他们穿过小溪,走进了灌木丛.

sentences.en: They tried to clear a path through the underbrush.
sentences.cn: 他们试图从灌木丛中开辟出一条小路.

sentences.en: Thick underbrush or woodland affording cover for game.
sentences.cn: 可供动物藏身的浓密的下层林丛或树林.

trans.tran_en: bushes, small trees etc growing under and around larger trees in a forest
